messages.content: <video><audio>Analyze the emotions in the following streaming video.

[{"timestamp": 2.113, "emotion": "contempt", "summary_reasoning": "Self-deprecating words, sneering expression, disdainful tone."}, {"timestamp": 8.321, "emotion": "bitter", "summary_reasoning": "Sharp, forceful tone, resentful words."}, {"timestamp": 18.652, "emotion": "resentful", "summary_reasoning": "Accusatory tone, hardened facial expression, blaming words."}, {"timestamp": 22.537, "emotion": "despair", "summary_reasoning": "Voice drops, slower speech, sad tone."}, {"timestamp": 33.778, "emotion": "humiliation", "summary_reasoning": "Pained expression, shameful tone, turning away."}, {"timestamp": 40.049, "emotion": "anguish", "summary_reasoning": "Intense, pained tone, tragic expression, words of cosmic curse."}]
